DEMO_101_MSG_010:
̅Hmm, I've been waiting for you, ȁ. 
Have a look at that building over there, will you?
DEMO_101_MSG_020: ̅That building is known as the Centre Building. It used to be home to our human friends when we last visited these parts.
DEMO_101_MSG_030:
́Hmm... oddly enough, I no longer sense any humans here. 
Could it be... they abandoned their city?
DEMO_101_MSG_040: ̅No... if that is the case, I need to be sure. Jack... I must ask you to head there and verify my theory.
DEMO_101_MSG_050: ̅I presume you'll be going as well, correct? I'm sure you're curious as well, and... I'd feel better having you along.
